r.d: Interface to Hatena's XML-API. feature, follows: It provides objects to operate Hatena's Bookmark or Fotolife service, and get information from Hatena Web Site.
r.n:
We can use Hatena's Web Servies API with this package. i like Hatena. i want to say "thank you" to developer's member in Hatena. Because there was help of many people, I was able to make a package. Thanks for Mr.Shoma.
0.1.2) converted to package2.xml and added new class 'Services_Hatena_Question'
